concept.description: Provides Java types as aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MERGE (aggregationLevel:CodeCharta:AggregationLevel{name:":Java:Type"}) WITH aggregationLevel MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(metricsType:Java:Type) WHERE NOT metricsType:Inner WITH aggregationLevel, metricsType MATCH (metricsType)-[:DECLARES*0..]->(aggregatedType:Java:Type) WHERE NOT aggregatedType:Generated MERGE (metricsType)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) MERGE (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(nodeMetrics) MERGE (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(aggregatedType) RETURN aggregationLevel as AggregationLevel, count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a CodeCharta report for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Java:Type)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(:CodeCharta:Metrics), tree = shortestPath((root:Java:Package)-[:CONTAINS*]->(type)) WHERE NOT ( type:Generated or (:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(root) // identify the root package ) WITH nodes(tree) as nodes UNWIND nodes as node // filter out duplicate packages WITH distinct node OPTIONAL MATCH (parentNode:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(node) WITH node, parentNode OPTIONAL MATCH (node)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) WITH node, parentNode, nodeMetrics OPTIONAL MATCH (nodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->(toNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) RETURN node as Node, node.name as NodeLabel, parentNode as ParentNode, nodeMetrics as NodeMetrics, collect(edgeMetrics) as EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Provides empty node and edge metrics for Maven modules.
concept.cypher: MERGE (aggregationLevel:CodeCharta:AggregationLevel{name:":Maven:Project"}) WITH aggregationLevel MATCH (project:Maven:Project:Directory) MERGE (project)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) MERGE (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(nodeMetrics) WITH project, aggregationLevel, nodeMetrics MATCH (project)-[:CREATES]->(:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Java:Type) WHERE NOT type:Generated MERGE (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type) RETURN aggregationLevel as AggregationLevel, count(distinct nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a CodeCharta report for Maven modules.
concept.cypher: MATCH (node:Maven:Project:Directory)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) OPTIONAL MATCH (parentNode:Maven:Project:Directory)-[:HAS_MODULE]->(node) OPTIONAL MATCH (nodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->(toNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) RETURN node AS Node, node.fqn AS NodeLabel, parentNode AS ParentNode, nodeMetrics as NodeMetrics, collect(edgeMetrics) as EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Provides numberOfTypes metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type) WITH nodeMetrics, count(type) as numberOfTypes SET nodeMetrics.numberOfTypes = numberOfTypes RETURN count(nodeMetrics) as NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides rloc and complexity metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Java:Method) WITH nodeMetrics, sum(method.effectiveLineCount) AS rloc, sum(method.cyclomaticComplexity) AS complexity SET nodeMetrics.rloc = rloc SET nodeMetrics.complexity = complexity RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides fanIn metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (aggregationLevel:CodeCharta:AggregationLevel), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(dependentNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependentType:Type), (dependentType:Type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(type) WHERE nodeMetrics <> dependentNodeMetrics WITH nodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) AS fanIn, sum(dependsOn.weight) as fanInTotal SET nodeMetrics.fanIn = fanIn SET nodeMetrics.fanInTotal = fanInTotal RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides fanOut node metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (aggregationLevel:CodeCharta:AggregationLevel), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(dependencyNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependencyType:Type), (type:Type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyType) WHERE nodeMetrics <> dependencyNodeMetrics WITH nodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) AS fanOut, sum(dependsOn.weight) as fanOutTotal SET nodeMetrics.fanOut = fanOut SET nodeMetrics.fanOutTotal = fanOutTotal RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides FanOut node and edge metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (aggregationLevel:CodeCharta:AggregationLevel), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(fromNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (aggregationLevel)-[:CONTAINS]->(toNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependencyType:Type), (type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyType) WHERE fromNodeMetrics <> toNodeMetrics WITH fromNodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) as coupling, sum(dependsOn.weight) as totalCoupling, toNodeMetrics CALL { WITH fromNodeMetrics, coupling, totalCoupling, toNodeMetrics MERGE (fromNodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->(toNodeMetrics) SET edgeMetrics.coupling = coupling SET edgeMetrics.totalCoupling = totalCoupling RETURN edgeMetrics } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(edgeMetrics) AS EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a relation HAS_SOURCE_FILE between a Java type and the file from the Git history.
concept.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Java:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type) // determine source file name from class name WITH type, split(type.fileName,"/") as segments WITH type, segments, range(0, size(segments) -2) AS indexes WITH type, reduce(path = "", index in indexes | path + segments[index] + "/") + type.sourceFileName as sourceFileName // find file in Git history that ends with the source file name MATCH (file:Git:File) WHERE file.relativePath ends with sourceFileName CALL { WITH type, file MERGE (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(file) } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(type) as TypesWithSourceFile

concept.description: Provides NumberOfCommits node metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type), (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(gitFile:Git:File), (commit:Git:Commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->(:Git:Change)-[:MODIFIES]->(gitFile) WITH nodeMetrics, count(distinct commit) as numberOfCommits SET nodeMetrics.numberOfCommits = numberOfCommits RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides NumberOfAuthors node metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type), (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(gitFile:Git:File), (author:Git:Author)-[:COMMITTED]->(:Git:Commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->(:Git:Change)-[:MODIFIES]->(gitFile) WITH nodeMetrics, count(distinct author) as numberOfAuthors SET nodeMetrics.numberOfAuthors = numberOfAuthors RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics
